alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:07PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino County through 530 PM MST... At 506 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument, or 19 miles north of Flagstaff, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wupatki National Monument. This includes U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 432 and 449. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim
